title: Novel Interweaves Fact And Fiction To Explore Diamonds' Allure
teaser: "The Engagements" tells four fictional stories and the real-life story of the woman who dreamed up the tag line "A Diamond is Forever."
contentencoded:
This week, J. Courtney Sullivan‘s novel “The Engagements” comes out in paperback. The book has been optioned for a possible film by Reece Witherspoon’s production company, Pacific Standard.

“The Engagements” tells four fictional stories involving diamond engagement rings, as well as the real-life story of Frances Gerety, the woman who dreamed up the tag line “A Diamond is Forever.”

Here & Now revisits host Robin Young’s conversation with J. Courtney Sullivan from when the book first came out.

  • See the original interview and read an excerpt of “The Engagements”

Guest

  • J. Courtney Sullivan, author of “The Engagement.” She tweets @jcourtsull.
